1. What is the relationship between tobacco use and physical activity 

```{r}
smoking_data <- new_youth_risk_df %>%
  filter(ShortQuestionText %in% c("Current cigarette use", "Smoked >10 cigarettes", "Current daily cigarette use", "Frequent cigarette use")) %>%
  group_by(ShortQuestionText, Race) %>%
  summarise(Greater_Risk_Data_Value = round(mean(Greater_Risk_Data_Value, na.rm =TRUE), digits = 0), Lesser_Risk_Data_Value = round(mean(Lesser_Risk_Data_Value, na.rm =TRUE), digits = 0)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Greater_Risk_Data_Value)) %>%
  filter(Race != "Total")
```
